price: И Аду и Семуду и становницима Реса и многим народима између њих,
arabic: وَعَادٗا وَثَمُودَاْ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونَۢا بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waʿādan wathamūdā wa-aṣḥāba al-rasi waqurūnan bayna dhālika kathīran
